mapper.select: SELECT UI_NUM, UI_ID, UI_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(UI_BIRTH, '%Y-%m-%d')UI_BIRTH FROM USER_INFO ORDER BY UI_ID
SELECT UI_NUM, UI_ID, UI_PWD, UI_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(UI_BIRTH, '%Y-%m-%d')UI_BIRTH, UI_DESC, DATE_FORMAT(CREDAT, '%Y-%m-%d') CREDAT FROM user_Info WHERE UI_NUM=#{uiNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_info(UI_ID, UI_NAME, UI_PWD, UI_BIRTH, UI_DESC, CREDAT, CRETIM, LMODAT, LMOTIM) VALUES(#{uiId}, #{uiName}, #{uiPwd}, #{uiBirth}, #{uiDesc}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%H%i%s'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%H%i%s'))
